arts.ttl: Juventus vs Atalanta - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Serie A clash between Juventus and Atalanta BC, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Juventus Tracking Atalanta Loanee After Summer Attempt
arts.sum: Marco Palestra has made a strong immediate impact at Cagliari, earning a regular role from the get-go, turning heads for his dynamism, and providing his first assist of the season versus Lecce. Juventus and Parma tried to acquire him last summer. The post Juventus Tracking Atalanta Loanee After Summer Attempt appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.
